extends java.lang.Object

Contains checks frequently applied on parameters.

Method Detail

nullCheckParam

public static void nullCheckParam(java.lang.Object paramValue,
                                  java.lang.String paramName)
Checks if the given parameter value is null and reports an NullPointerException in this case.

Parameters:
paramValue - the value to be checked
paramName - name of the parameter, used to report the problem to the user
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - thrown either the paramValue or paramName is null

nullCheckParam

public static void nullCheckParam(java.lang.Object paramValue)
Checks whether the given parameter value is null and reports an NullPointerException in this case.

Parameters:
paramValue - the value to be checked
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - thrown if the paramValue is null

nullCheckField

public static void nullCheckField(java.lang.Object fieldValue,
                                  java.lang.String fieldName)
Checks if the given field value is null and reports an IllegalStateException in this case.

Parameters:
fieldValue - the value to be checked
fieldName - name of the field, used to report the problem to the user
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - thrown if the fieldName is null
java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if the fieldValue is null

nullCheckField

public static void nullCheckField(java.lang.Object fieldValue)
Checks whether the given field value is null and reports an IllegalStateException in this case.

Parameters:
fieldValue - the value to be checked
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if the fieldValue is null

nullCheckVariable

public static void nullCheckVariable(java.lang.Object varValue,
                                     java.lang.String varName)
Checks whether the given value of a local variable is null and reports an IllegalStateException in this case.

Parameters:
varValue - the value to be checked
varName - name of the local variable, used to report the problem to the user
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - thrown if the varName is null
java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if the varValue is null

nullCheckVariable

public static void nullCheckVariable(java.lang.Object varValue)
Checks whether the given value of a local variable is null and reports an IllegalStateException in this case.

Parameters:
varValue - the value to be checked
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if the varValue is null

emptyStringCheckParam

public static void emptyStringCheckParam(java.lang.String param,
                                         java.lang.String varName)
This method checks if param is null or empty string.

Parameters:
param -
varName -
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - in case param is null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case param is empty string or contains only white space characters
